titleStmt.title: Mr. John Eliot, called, doctor of medicine, his last speech and advice to the world, at his suffering, March 9. 1694
titleStmt.author: Eliot, John, d. 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Mosman, and are to be sold at his shop in the Parliament closs,
